name: Loops of Zen
description: Loops of Zen is simple to learn, yet difficult to put down. Rotate scattered tiles to reconnect broken paths and complete the loops. Tiles are randomly generated and grow in number and complexity as sets are completed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb DDR3 or better video card Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
